pkgmetadata.longdescription: Welcome!========Xtesting have leveraged on Functest efforts to provide a reference testingframework: * Requirements Management: https://wiki.opnfv.org/display/functest/Requirements+management * Docker Slicing: http://testresults.opnfv.org/functest/dockerslicing/ * Functest Framework: http://testresults.opnfv.org/functest/framework/Xtesting aims at allowing a smooth integration of new Functest Kubernetestestcases.But, more generally, it eases building any CI/CD toolchain for otherdomains than testing Virtualized Infrastructure Managers (VIM) such as`OpenStack <https://www.openstack.org/>`_.To learn more about Xtesting: * Documentation: http://xtesting.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ * Gerrit: https://gerrit.opnfv.org/gerrit/#/q/project:functest-xtestingGet in touch via `email <mailto:opnfv-tech-discuss@lists.opnfv.org>`_.
